link.title: Ada County Elections - Elections

meta.name: description
meta.content: Ada County has the largest elections office in the state of Idaho. Engage with the public to educate citizens about the voting process...
Ada County has the largest elections office in the state of Idaho. Engage with the public to educate citizens about the voting process...

input.name: q
input.placeholder: How can Ada County help you today? Begin typing.

nav.class: navbar navbar-expand-lg mw-xl mx-auto w-100 d-print-none

li.class: menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-home current-menu-item page_item page-item-4 current_page_item menu-item-has-children menu-item-258

h2.span: Welcome to Ada County Elections! Voting is the foundation of our democracy, and our job is to help Idahoans vote. On this website, you will find information to register to vote, current elections, how to cast your ballot and other important election information.

div.p:
The next election in Ada County is November 5, 2024!
Are you registered to vote? Click the button below for all of the information you need before heading to the polls!

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_border_width_2 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text vc_sep_color_black wpb_content_element wpb_content_element

p.span: Need more information on voting? Please contact our office.
To place a relay call, dial 711 or TTY:1-800-377-3529

li.class: menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-home current-menu-item page_item page-item-4 current_page_item menu-item-924

p.class: text-center small text-white bg-blue-dark m-0 pb-4
